text: Reading the Python cookbook at the minute and currently looking at generators.
I'm finding it hard to get my head round.
As I come from a Java background, is there a Java equivelant?
The book was speaking about 'Producer / Consumer', however when I hear that I think of threading.
Can anyone explain what a generator is and why you would use it?
Without quoting any books, obviously(Unless you can find a decent, simplistic answer direct from a book).
Perhaps with examples, if you're feeling generous!
